title: Lexus
summary: Lexus (レクサス, Rekusasu) is the luxury vehicle division of the Japanese automaker Toyota. The Lexus brand is marketed in more than 70 countries and territories worldwide[3] and is Japan's largest-selling make  of premium cars. It has ranked among the 10 largest Japanese global brands in market value.[4] Lexus is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan. Operational centers are located in Brussels, Belgium, and Plano, Texas, United States.
